name: Forgotten Mysteries
description:
This is a project that is mainly build around level design and story telling. It's a walking simulator with small puzzle elements.

The idea was to make a small game that should be my first game that I actually finish and I only used the assets from the low poly asset bundle that I bought (some small things are actually done by me).

I hope you like it. It's a short adventure with an interesting and mysterious story and setting. I will probably make a sequel to the game sometime (with a different art style and different puzzle mechanics. It will also probably have a little bit of combat).

If you find any gamebreaking bugs, let me know!
